attributes.action: UK to change its constitution regarding lending - Iceland since going bankrupt in 2008 did just that!
attributes.additional_details: Government and the people are shackled by huge ever growing national debt due to fiat money (currencies backed by trust). This trust has been manipulated and abused so many times with the rich vs. poor chasm as blatant evidence that things aren’t getting better but worse with each day. The People no longer have confidence in the current economic road map. We are told that this is just the way things are and we have to make do with the current economic model. Iceland changed this, why can’t we?
